name: landmarkDetection
author: Nesrin Mansouri / Univ-Nantes
description: Includes Milvue annotation init and a landmark detection pipeline
command-line: unzip [DICOM_INPUT] -d /workspace/dicom_input; mkdir OUTDIR /workspace/milvue_output; bash /workspace/run_nndet.sh && cp input_params.json OUTDIR && cp -r /workspace/HEATMAP_TEST_final/T220/BB_TEST/predictions_1/* /workspace/milvue_output/* OUTDIR/ && tar -cvzf [OUTPUT_FILE] OUTDIR && rm -rf OUTDIR

inputs.name: T2 dicom_input (ZIP)
inputs.description: Zip archive of Input medical images in DICOM format.
